paper_title.en: Investigation of Accounting Practices in a early 19th century British Railway Company Using Text Mining
paper_title.ja: Investigation of Accounting Practices in a early 19th century British Railway Company Using Text Mining

description.en: This paper invistigates the development and background of accounting practices at the London and Birmingham Railway Company using text mining.The result suggests that the infeasibilty of funderaising through issuance of new shares might have been an important factor as well as influence of operating results in the 19th century accounting changes.
description.ja: This paper invistigates the development and background of accounting practices at the London and Birmingham Railway Company using text mining.The result suggests that the infeasibilty of funderaising through issuance of new shares might have been an important factor as well as influence of operating results in the 19th century accounting changes.

paper_title.en: 「のれんの会計史（３）」
paper_title.ja: 「のれんの会計史（３）」

description.en: のれんの概念および会計処理について，その生成過程から歴史的に検討し，のれん会計の本質を考察した。（近・現代）
description.ja: のれんの概念および会計処理について，その生成過程から歴史的に検討し，のれん会計の本質を考察した。（近・現代）
